tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Damodaran P R ‚Äì The best of the best Ortho Doctor

Four years back, my mom met with a road accident and fractured her right arm. She was rushed to Apollo Perungudi in an ambulance to the ER. After the first aid, she was diagnosed with humerus bone fracture. That was the first time, we met Dr. Damodaran. He not only assessed my mom‚Äôs condition but also our family‚Äôs anxiety and fear because of the traumatic road accident. The first thing he did was to calm all of us down by patiently explaining what has happened and what corrective measures he is going to take. He spoke very patiently to my sobbing mom, relaxed her and gave all the assurance she needed. He explained the procedure to me in detail. I still think he absolutely had no need to take the time to talk to the distraught family, but he did that. Just by talking to him, we, including my mom were at peace and gained strength to face the surgery. 

The surgery was successfully completed. Mom went to recovery room, where her vitals were monitored. Doctor reached out to us to explain how the plate was fixed and the process of recovery. I could not imagine how a busy surgeon like him finds time in the world to talk, not only to the patient but also to their family members, just to put their mind to ease. Even before the surgery, I was confident that he is going to cure my mom and I have come to the right place. We had total faith in him.

Dr. Damodaran‚Äôs loving care did not stop with the surgery. During every OP visit, post-surgery, he attended to my mom with the same care. He reassured her, encouraged her to do physio and motivated her back to normal health with full functioning of her arm.

Last week, while cleaning the house, my mom had a bad fall in the living room. She was in severe pain. After I got the call about the incident, my first thought was, maybe she hit her arm again and the plate she had has moved. Oh boy, was I wrong! She could not move her right arm. I remembered from the last incident that fracture causes swelling. But this time, it did not swell or I misses to see it with the cloths on. We went to a local hospital, they did the Xray and diagnosed it is a fracture again, near the shoulder. It was devastating to see my mom, 61 years now, suffering from unbearable pain. I panicked. I called Dr.Damodaran‚Äôs number directly. This was on a Saturday, around 8 PM. Doctor immediately picked up. I tried to remind him that he treated my mom with a surgery 4 years back and she has another fracture now.  Doctor asked me to bring her to the hospital immediately and share the Xray over phone. 

When there were some complexities in getting the ambulance, I called the Doctor again. He immediately spoke to the ER and we got the ambulance in 15 minutes. After we reached the ER, my mom was examined fully to ensure that she is all good from the fall except for the fractured arm. Doctor called me again, explained what has happened this time. My mom also complained of chest pain, which she started realizing only after the settling down of arm pain with the painkillers. We guessed, with the terrible pain of the fracture, she couldn‚Äôt pay attention to the chest. Thankfully, it didn‚Äôt turn out to be anything serious. 

After consulting with cardiologist and his clearance, Dr. Damodaran performed the surgery. This time, I absolutely had no questions on the surgery or no doubts. I had nothing to worry. I knew that he is the best of the best and he is going to make my mom alright again.

On the day of the surgery, Doctor had a pretty busy day. He had back-to-back procedures with different patients. My mom‚Äôs surgery went for a long time, or I felt like that. I figured it was a complex operation as Doctor decided to not remove the old plate and add the new one without causing a friction.

Just like last time, Doctor met us after the surgery. He showed us pictures of the new plating, and explained the deformity correction and rotator cuff repair. We will be meeting him in the coming weeks for regular check-ups.
I really feel fortunate that I was able to reach Dr. Damodaran that night and he was available to perform the surgery. He is an angel in disguise. I wish from the bottom of my heart that he lives a very long life, to help people recover from pain. ** ** *** **** ** *** ***** Thank you, Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was a weekday afternoon and I was at work as usual.
My mom called me and said - "Dad (72 yrs) fell down and injured his head and leg, come home"
I rushed home and found that injury on head was bleeding and he could not move due to the leg injury.
Called family doctor for help, luckily he provided Dr. Damodharan contact info.
Immediately called him and explained the situation.
He provided some tips to stop the bleeding and ambulance info.
Called Apollo OMR ambulance and informed the location.
Ambulance arrived quickly and started for hospital after first aid.
Met Dr. Damodharan in emergency ward. He examined and assured nothing to worry about.
He explained the issue clearly with the X-Ray and need of an immediate femur neck fracture surgery.
He understood our anxiety and answered all our questions and concerns with patience.
Entire family got relieved and were filled with confidence with his reassurance.
Immediately after surgery, he met us and said that the surgery went well and showed us the implant pics.
After couple of days we got discharged and went home.
I really appreciate the post-op support he provided through WhatsApp and Phone.
He answered numerous questions I had, with patience and offered medical care when needed.
Now my Father is happy, healthy and relieved from all the trauma he went through.
Dr. Damodharan is very friendly, kind and service-minded with positive attitude.
He not only treats physical injuries but also provides mental strength and supported us throughout this phase.
Thanks a lot for all the help and support üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My Wife had a fall and had dislocated her left shoulder joint and this was put back under anaesthesia. But following fall, she developed severe burning sensation and weakness in the left hand. My wife was struggling to do any work and even struggling to look after her self. She has been taking various medications for that but did not improve. Then we met Dr Damodaran through practo in his clinic. we didn't need to wait long as it was by appointment and the staffs were pleasant. Dr Damodaran examined my wife thoroughly and diagnosed that she had  isolated nerve injury and called it ulnar nerve neuropraxia due to dislocation. Apparently this is unusual occurrence. He suggested physiotherapy to start with. I must say within few days my wife experienced improvement and the burning sensation reduced. and her tablets intake came down drastically. The physiotherapist in his clinic was experienced and she could teach simple things. Dr Damodaran's correct diagnosis and timely treatment helped my wife gain her strength. She has improved a lot.
I recommend Dr Damodaran not only for his ability but also for his pleasant demeanor and the patience he has to explain things in detail.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My mom aged 63 had an unexpected bad fall 3 months ago and had to be rushed to Apollo OMR.  Based on the initial x-rays, we were told by the emergency treatment doctor that she had dislocated her ankle and met with multiple fracture and might have to undergo an immediate surgery and that Dr.Damodaran will advise us further. This had put the entire family into a state of anxiety and concern.  

Dr.Damodaran came over to meet us and explained the situation very clearly with the x-ray reports and rationale for the immediate surgery required.  He also explained the situation to my sister who was anxiously waiting over the phone call from the US.  The doctor was extremely patient with us and answered all our questions, which helped us decide to go ahead with the next course of treatment.   

My mom felt a great sense of relief and comfort with the assurance provided by the doctor before the surgery that she will do well.  
By God's grace, the surgery went well.  Immediately after the surgery, the doctor came out of the theatre and showed us the pictures of the implant done to the ankle fracture.  Post 6 weeks of complete bed rest, the doctor suggested a good physiotherapist and gave complete oversight and supervision throughout the sessions.  

Today, we are all so happy to see our mom walk on her own without support.   We owe this credit to Dr.Damodaran who has been with us throughout  during this phase by providing utmost care and attention and offering medical guidance as and when needed.   Thank you very much Doctor and truly appreciate your service.   

A treatment can provide physical cure to a patient but mental strength can be gained only through the doctor's friendly, patient, re-assuring positive attitude.  My mom gained immense mental strength through your amazing attitude.  Thank you once again and our humble regards. Rama & Chitra
reply_text: Your kind words have touched my heart. God bless you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My mom had to be rushed to ER and doctor gave the best treatment at the shortest available time. Even if he was new to us, we felt that he was old time friend and we can ask him any questions and share any kind of treatment issues or problems and he attends to it immediately. He also keeps track that his supporting team is also doing their best for the patient and the patient is fully satisfied and taken best care of. He is updated in his work and very competent and I feel safe to take my old parents to him for treatment as he would do only what is necessary and he would treat my parents so well throughout the treatment. Thank you Doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very friendly and a humble personified person. Gave a detailed info about my muscle condition and where i exactly stood as far as my body was concerned. His prescribed medicines & physiotherapy really helped my muscles to relax  and in turn helped me to sleep without any leg pain.  A Special mention on his physiotherapy team. Both Leo & Ilakiya were extremely kind and very methodical in their approach. Overall, it was a satisfying consultation and i felt  i had come at the right time This is my candid feedback about Dr, Damodaran.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor was very friendly and explained in detail about why I had pain in my shoulder and the treatment for the same. He prescribed medicines as well as physiotherapy  with in-house specialists. The environment was clean and professional. I was able to easily fix appointment with the doctor by co-ordinating with his secretary and was able to meet him at the appointed time. The doctor's experience and excellence played a big role in boosting up my confidence.  Apart from being a good doctor, he is a great human.

Thank you so much for all your contribution and efforts that you do to keep us well.

I really admire all your dedication towards your work. Thanks for being an amazing doctor.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your kind words Tamizh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Damodaran was patient enough to listen to my problems. He took time to understand and assess the problem. He gave a beautiful explanation of my problem and the proposed treatment. His explanation was so good even a layman like me could understand. He was open about the proposed treatment and also was honey to say if the treatment will be effective or not. He also made me aware that my case was quite unique and could potentially become a case study. He did not rush with his treatment and was patient and suggested a phased treatment. Overall a very good experience and complete satisfaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Dr Damo is very friendly, humane, and service-minded. I had consulted for my friend who met with an accident and had Calcaneal multiple fracture. 
Dr. Damo was very patient, listened to the entire sequence of events, provided telephonic consultation to my friend who was in Neyveli, reviewed his records (X-rays) online, diagnosed spot on and suggested for the correct surgery. 
Doctor had a special calming effect on my friend and his family, gave them complete confidence, assurance and helped them even with all aspects of hospitalization. The surgery was successful, and my friend is able to walk now. 
Apart from physical cure and clarity, we thank and appreciate the guidance, positive attitude, assurance, and confidence Dr Damo provided during the critical situation. 
Thanks to Dr. Damo, I would highly recommend Dr Damo to all.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Dr Damodaran treated my 91 year uncle for a left hip fracture sustained from a fall in his room. 
Right from his first visit to assess my uncle at home, followed by the admission process in Apollo Hospital, Perungudi,
the surgery itself and then the post operative care was so well organised by Dr Damodaran and his team.
That my uncle is able to get up from bed on his own and to be able to sit, stand and walk (with minimal assistance) after 
3 weeks from surgery is testimony for his surgical and patient management skills.   My uncle enjoys the care, respect and attention 
given by Dr Damodaran which probably helped him to get over this ordeal with minimal discomfort.
Thank you very much Dr Damodaran for everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
a. There is some pain in the right arm elbow to our 7 month old baby started crying because of twisted her hands when trying to crawling here and there

b. So we went to hospital and we sat front of Dr. Dhamodahran and explain what happened 

c. Its a "Value Momentum" He did some technique at baby's hands to recover the pain in the spot (just like a computer mouse click, heard the tik sound and thats all, so no scan/x-rays , my daughter start playing with laughing after some long hrs.. 

Thanks Dr. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr Damodaran and we had a very good experience. He was kind and supportive and more importantly put the patient through certain tests which helped diagnose the issue/condition faced by the patient. Dr Damodaran was very professional in his approach and having sensed from the test results that patient could have spinal related condition, he drafted in two of his relevant colleagues and they explained to us the condition which determined the future course of action. Despite being a senior/speciality and busy doctor he was kind, considerate and gave us sufficient time, and more importantly provided us sound professional judgement. Thank you doctor for your help.

*** ** *** **** *********** ****** ************* * ********  * he treats his patients with high degree of respect & friendliness like family members.

He ensure to give the best possible consultation/ advise, on the first meeting itself , repeat visits are rare until it‚Äôs most urgent - many thanks doctor!

I have been visiting Dr. Damo for my shoulder and neck problems. He is very friendly and professional. He takes time to listen and understand the concerns. It is a delightful experience - excellent clinic atmosphere - neat & clean, friendly staff - especially the physiotherapist staff are very caring and ensuring the personalized treatment. 

Thank you Dr for your great care and service.

I have never seen a doctor spending so much time for one patient and trying to ease the pain with his treatment. Would definitely recommend people . Wonderful human being very down to earth. Was very lucky to be treated by such an amazing doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I went for a ligament tear.  This was a minor issue as far as the doctor is concerned because he would have seen worse cases . But he never let me feel that way . He very well articulated what I felt and did not negate my fear and pain . This is something which is lacking in most doctors . I know a doctor is well qualified and has a special touch but I‚Äôm also looking for a doctor who has excellent bedside manner.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very professional at the same time personal attention given.  
Easy to get appointment
Quick and correct diagnosis of the problem
Treatment suggested and medicines prescribed ****** ****** *****  Physiotherapist attached to the clinic also helped by guiding us with correct treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Mine was chronic issue and Dr Damu was able to get this diagnosed on the very first time itself. Couple of XRays and 10 minutes of diagnosis is what all it took. 7 days later I was able to go about my regular routine and 30 days later I was able to play again. 

A very friendly and enthusiastic person, his cheerfulness rubs on you. I would recommend him anytime for anything even remotely connected to ortho.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words. Much appreciated

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consulted Dr Damodaran for my fracture treatment. I had T5 Metatarsal bone. Doctor examined well and clearly told me the need for surgery. I underwent the surgery and also consulted him for another 6 weeks post operation. What I really like about him was his warmth and care. I did not feel like a patient but felt more like a family member. You can trust him totally and I recommend him to anybody who has anything to do with bones treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,

The doctor informed about the injury and explained about the actual reason.  He quickly gave the solution and asked to start physiotherapy.  

He also visited the sessions and asked about the recovery daily. 

Thanks for the treatment and all the support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Recently I had underwent hand fracture surgery by Dr.damodharan. when I was going to office, fell down from 2 wheeler. So immediately admitted to omr appolo hospital. Dr.damu team given first aid swiftly. Within 30 minutes Dr damodharan came and explained me about the injury and necessary for surgery. When I said ok, Within 6 hours surgery done. Now I recuperating well. Whenever asks doubts through online, he will respond immediately. And also speak friendly, Nice to have interaction with him. Kudos to Dr.damodharan.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went to this doctor as I had fell down and hurt my hip. I went to check to make sure none of my bones were broken. Doctor made me take X ray and said everything was fine. But then he made me do some Stretches saying I have spasms in my back and neck. He stretched my neck upwards two to three times *** **** ***** **** * **** **** ****** **** **** ** *** ***** ***** ** *** ****** *** *** *** ** ***** **** **** *** **** ******** *** **** ********* And he kept telling me to go for physiotherapy to his private clinic in adyar where he has a sports person doing the physiotherapy. ** **** * ****** ** ****** ** **** ** **** ** **** *** *** **** ******** *** **************

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ****** ** *** ** *** ******** ** ********** *** ******** I was started saying problems but he was concentrated on only particular thing. If I ask about rest of the issue he said will say later. My problem is all joints pain I said fingers in hand is also paining, he advised to take xray for hand finally he said no problem in Bone's. No use of spending money and time. 700 doctor fee, 250 registration, 690 x ray and 305 medicine. Why he wrote medicine also don't know. He was speaking in phone and started checking. Visited doctor as per the practo review but no use.

review: The Doctor reacted very quickly when he saw my condition, he did not make me wait and took me immediately in person to the x-ray room and found that I had a fracture and then took me to the treatment room for a temporary solution to my problem , all this was done within 8 minutes. The next day I had a successful operation, I was very happy with the way the doctor treated me.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr Damodaran was extremely receptive and patiently listened to the entire history. He clearly analysed the underlying cause and suggested several courses of action.

Plus, the center has an in-house X-ray lab and physiotherapy sections, making it easy to quickly get through a diagnosis.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Referred by Dr. Muralidaran for Ultrasound Physio therapy (3days) to my mother. Room is small and little congested, but physio therapists are good in both attitude and conversation. Explained all things patiently and clearly.

It's better if they allocated different rooms for men&women. Overall worth visiting.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor patiently listened to my problems and then suggested necessary precautions. His approach, explanation regarding health problem is tremendous and solutions are really class apart. He did not prescribe any unnecessary medicines. I am recovering well and would definitely recommend the doctor.
